name: Red Ribbon Game: Night City Metro Police
name_original: Red Ribbon Game: Night City Metro Police
description: You play as the robotic, rouge cop named Talus. Jump, run, and stomp your way to Dexton Apollo, notorious peddler of drugs and weapons in Night City that must be stopped. Will you be able to stop Apollo? Will you stumble your way through Apollo's floating air ship, or will you adeptly maneuver your way  to taking down all of Apollo's goons and merchandise?
